definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

sentences.english: M. Charles Myriel emigrated to Italy at the very beginning of the Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 米里哀先生，當革命剛開始時便出亡到意大利。

definition: my late father/my ancestors/the late emperor
to recover one's power or authority/restoration (of a past regime)
to meet with disaster/killed/in the clutches of the enemy/to fall foul of/in danger

former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
official in charge of public records

to succeed to a title/to inherit
